characterDescription:
Lusintia is the honorspren assigned to show Veil around on her first day in the fortress of Lasting Integrity.
Veil notes that she always seems to be nearby, and determines that she'd clearly been assigned to watch Shallan.

characterDetails.Appearance:
She is a shorter spren, with hair kept about level with the point of her chin. She doesn t wear a uniform, but the stiff jacket and trousers she prefers might as well have been one.
Her short hair hangs along the sides of her white-blue face.
characterDetails.Characteristics: She had no idea that humans are fragile.
